entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or wet flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:19 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
